cookies.a11y-accept: Accept the use of all cookies and proceed to the app.
cookies.a11y-cancel: Reject the use of non-essential cookies and proceed the app.
cookies.info-label: Opens a dialog with the ARSnova data protection policy.
cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you return to our website and to allow you to access your data and settings. We also use these technologies for statistical purposes.
cookies.intro-privacy1: You will find more information in our
cookies.update-later: You can review and change these settings at any time via the data protection menu.
cookies.category-essential-desc: Some cookies are required by the application to work correctly. These are, for example, authentication data after signing in.
cookies.category-functional-desc: Functional cookies make the application more user-friendly by allowing settings (e.g. the selected theme) to be saved locally.
cookies.category-statistics-desc: Statistical cookies help us to improve the application by giving us insight into how our application is used.

data-protection.a11y: Below you will find the privacy policy of ARSnova.
data-protection.title: Data Privacy

header.a11y-back: Go back to the previous page.
header.a11y-room: Open the user menu. Here you can view the rooms you have attended or log out of your account.
header.a11y-news: Opens a dialog that shows you the latest changes and links you to our news page.
header.room-id-copied: Room link was copied to the clipboard.

home-page.a11y-join-button: Enter the room with the specified room number.
home-page.a11y-join-input: Here you can enter the  key of the room you want to join. Your lecturer will tell you the room number.
home-page.a11y-welcome-message: Welcome to ARSnova. Enter an eight-digit room number to join a room or press the escape key to get information about key combinations.
home-page.a11y-home-shortcuts: You are on the homepage of ARSnova. Press key 1 to enter a room number, key 2 to create a new room, key 3 to select the language, key 9 to enter the user login or the room menu, or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
home-page.a11y-user-message: You are now on the user page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
home-page.a11y-user-shortcuts: Press key 1 to create a new room, key 2 join a room, key 3 to get your visited and created rooms, key 9 to enter the user login or the user menu, key 0 to go back to the home page, or key 9 to repeat this announcement.
home-page.a11y-room-join: Now enter the room number of the room you want to join.
home-page.exactly-8: A room number has exactly 8 digits.
home-page.no-room-found: No room found with this number.
home-page.only-numbers: A room number only contains digits.
home-page.see-news: A detailed list of the changes can be found in our
home-page.hot-fix-update: We have made minor bug fixes.

imprint.a11y: Below you will find the legal info of ARSnova.
imprint.title: Imprint

introduction.a11y: Below you will find an introduction to ARSnova.
introduction.title: »ARSnova«

import.description: Here you can import rooms you have created in version 2. Select an exported room and create it!
import.hint: Hint: Currently only questions of the following formats can be displayed: “Single-/Multiple-Choice”, “Likert”, “Yes/No” and “Text”.
import.please-login: Please log in first to permanently bind your rooms to your new ARSnova account.
import.error: That didn't work. Please check the format.

login.a11y-sso-login: You will be forwarded to {{provider}} to log in.
login.a11y-reset-pw: Opens a dialog for resetting your password.
login.a11y-register: Opens a dialog for the registration.
login.email-description: Enter your e-mail address with which you want to login with your ARSnova account here.
login.login-description: Log in with the entered account data
login.password-description: Enter your password with which you want to login with your ARSnova account here.

password-reset.a11y-cancel: Cancels password reset and brings you back to login.
password-reset.a11y-new-password2: Enter your new password here again
password-reset.a11y-reset-button: Sends a verification code to the entered e-mail address, with which a new password can be set.
password-reset.a11y-reset-key: Enter the verification code you received by e-mail here
password-reset.a11y-enter-email: Enter your e-mail address here to set a new password
password-reset.email-description: Enter your e-mail address here to reset your password.
password-reset.forgot-password: We will send you an e-mail to reset your password.
password-reset.new-password-successful: Your new password has been set.
password-reset.reset-button-description: Resets the password of your account
password-reset.reset-successful: Password was reset. Please check your mails.
password-reset.set-button-description: Set the new password for your account
password-reset.set-new-password: You have been sent a code with which you can set your new password.
password-reset.request-failed: Something has gone wrong. Please check your input.

register.a11y-cancel: Cancels the registration and brings you back to login.
register.email-description: You are now in the registation formular. Enter your e-mail address here.
register.password-description: Enter the password you want to register with here.
register.password-description-repeat: Please enter the password you want to register with again to make sure that you have not mistyped it.
register.register-request-error: Something went wrong. Maybe you already made the account?
register.register-successful: Your account has been created. Please check your mails.
register.please-accept: Du musst den Nutzungsbedingungen zustimmen um dich zu registieren.

room-list.a11y-join-room: Enter the room {{room}} with the number {{id}} in the role {{role}}
room-list.a11y-room-history: Your room history contains {{count}} rooms. Navigate through your rooms with Tab.
room-list.a11y-more-options: Show more options for this room
room-list.filter: Here you can filter the list of rooms.
room-list.no-room-history: You haven't joined any rooms yet.
room-list.room-successfully-removed: The room was successfully removed from the history.
room-list.added-successfully: The room was added to your list.
room-list.transfer-rooms-from-guest: Transfer rooms you created or visited without being logged in.
room-list.transfer-no-rooms: No rooms were found for transfer.

user-activation.a11y-key-input: Enter the activation key that you received by e-mail to login.
user-activation.a11y-cancel: Cancels the activation and brings you back to login.

dialog.a11y-cancel: Cancels the current process and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-delete: Confirms the action and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-update: Save the changes and close the dialog.
dialog.a11y-send: Sends your comment and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-tag: Select a category here if you want to categorize your comment.
dialog.a11y-comment-presentation: The comment {{comment}} is now displayed in full screen mode. Press the Escape key to close the dialog and return to the comment board.
dialog.a11y-edit-body: Edit the body of the question here.
dialog.a11y-edit-checkbox: Set here whether the answer is right or wrong.
dialog.a11y-room-name-input: Enter the name of the room you want to create here and confirm your entry with the Enter key.
dialog.a11y-qr-code: The QR code of your room is now displayed in full screen mode. Press the Tab key to copy the url of your room to the clipboard or the Escape key to close the dialog and return to the room overview
dialog.a11y-copy-url: Copy link to room to the clipboard
dialog.a11y-tokens: Navigate with the tab key through your bonus tokens.
dialog.really-delete-comment: Do you really want to delete this comment?
dialog.really-delete-comments: Do you really want to delete all comments of this room? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-comments-hint: There are comments in this room that you marked for a bonus. Remove the markers to delete all comments.
dialog.really-delete-answer: Do you really want to delete this answer?
dialog.really-delete-content: Do you really want to delete the following content? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-moderator: Do you really want to remove the following moderator?
dialog.really-delete-room: Do you really want to delete the following room? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-remove-room-from-history: Do you really want to remove the following room from your history?
dialog.really-delete-token: Do you really want to delete this token?
dialog.really-delete-tokens: Do you really want to delete all tokens of this room?
dialog.really-delete-account: Do you want to irrevocably delete your account with all rooms?
dialog.really-delete-account-admin: Do you want to irrevocably delete this account with all rooms?
dialog.really-reset-form: Do you really want to reset all inputs?
dialog.create-comment-description: Enter your comment to the audience here!
dialog.at-least-one: Please select at least 1 true answer.
dialog.no-empty: No empty fields are allowed. Please check your question.
dialog.content-group-name-input: Enter the name of the collection you want to create here.
dialog.content-group-created: Your question was added to new collection.
dialog.user-got-tokens: You have bonus tokens linked to this account that will be lost.
dialog.not-logged-in: You are not logged in. The room will be created with a guest account.
dialog.really-delete-answers: Do you really want to delete the answers to this question?
dialog.really-delete-all-answers: Do you really want to delete all answers of this collection?

errors.not-authorized: You're not authorized to view this page.
errors.room-not-found: There was no room found with this number.
